comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - create a report
   - add a data item
   - add one user property (name: time; type: dateTime)
   - switch to properties sheets view
   - select property named time
   - click on expression builder icon

expected behavior:

   - expression builder is displayed

actual behavior:

   - nothing happened, and exception thrown out in Error Log

Unhandled event loop exception
